title: Am I cooked?
content: I got 7.4sgpa in p cycle and I have selected ece branch, I have heard it's very hard score in ece so am I cooked can I atleast end up with 8+ end up by 6th sem?

comments.body: You will dw, you have nothing to worry about, you'll do just fine, 3rd year ece is easy
That's a bit assuring but any placement?ðŸ’€ðŸ˜­
no placements in ECE, do CSE Minor courses else u can forget about a job /s

For a ECE student to get placed in a tier 1 company.. one has to Master DSA + Learn computer fundamentals + have 2-3 good projects.. isnt this what any CS student have to do apart from the course curriculum and which can be done by an ECE student? What other advantage does a CS student have when it comes to placement?

For a ECE student to get placed in a tier 1 company.. one has to Master DSA + Learn computer fundamentals + have 2-3 good projects.. isnt this what any CS student have to do apart from the course curriculum to get a job and which can be done by an ECE student? What other advantage does a CS student have when it comes to placement?

The fact that they're in CS and a company would rather pick a CS grad who has exposure to the tools/code the company is hiring for through their experiences/projects/curriculum over an ECE grad who mostly wouldn't have the same. 

Check the FAQs, this has been discussed in detail.
Yes, you are charred my fella.....
Don't cross comment, its already answered above.
